nars.io

Class Texts

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.io.Texts

  • public class Texts
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for process Text & String input/output, ex: encoding/escaping and decoding/unescaping Terms

      • escape

        protected static java.lang.StringBuilder escape(java.lang.CharSequence s,
                                                boolean unescape,
                                                boolean useQuotes)

      • escape

        public static java.lang.StringBuilder escape(java.lang.CharSequence s)
        returns an escaped representation for input. ranges that begin and end with Symbols.QUOTE are escaped, otherwise the string is not modified.

      • unescape

        public static java.lang.StringBuilder unescape(java.lang.CharSequence s)
        returns an unescaped represntation of input

      • escapeLiteral

        public static java.lang.StringBuilder escapeLiteral(java.lang.CharSequence s)
        escapeLiteral does not involve quotes. this can be used to escape characters directly.

      • unescapeLiteral

        public static java.lang.StringBuilder unescapeLiteral(java.lang.CharSequence s)
        unescapeLiteral does not involve quotes. this can be used to unescape characters directly.

        the private char[] field in String class

      • overwrite

        public static void overwrite(java.lang.String s,
                             java.lang.String t)
        Change the first min(|s|, |t|) characters of s to t TODO must reset the hashcode field TODO this is untested and probably not yet functional

      • yarn

        public static java.lang.CharSequence yarn(int maxLen,
                                          java.lang.CharSequence... components)
        Half-way between a String and a Rope; concatenates a list of strings into an immutable CharSequence which is either: If a component is null, it is ignored. if total non-null components is 0, returns null if total non-null components is 1, returns that component. if the combined length <= maxLen, creates a StringBuilder appending them all. if the combined length > maxLen, creates a Rope appending them all. TODO do not allow a StringBuilder to appear in output, instead wrap in CharArrayRope

      • containsChar

        public static boolean containsChar(java.lang.CharSequence n,
                                   char c)

      • sequence

        public static java.lang.CharSequence sequence(java.lang.StringBuilder b)
        wraps a StringBuilder in CharArrayRope for use as a general purpose immutable CharSequence. StringBuilder lacks hashCode and other support that CharArrayRope provides. CharArrayRope can use the StringBuilder's underlying char[] directly without copy.
